mapper.select: SELECT user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, punchcardrecord_date, time_start, time_end, region, worktime FROM ( SELECT user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, region, cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) AS punchcardrecord_date, min( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) AS time_start, max( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) AS time_end, ROUND( TIMESTAMPDIFF( MINUTE, min( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ), max( cast( punchcardrecord_date AS datetime ) ) ) / 60, 2 ) AS worktime FROM punchcardrecorddetail GROUP BY user_id, center_id, group_id, team_id, jobnumber, region, cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) ORDER BY cast( punchcardrecord_date AS date ) ) newpunchcardrecord where punchcardrecord_date =DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM punchcardrecord WHERE USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM ( SELECT pun.USER_ID FROM punchcardrecord pun WHERE pun.PUNCHCARDRECORD_DATE = DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) GROUP BY pun.USER_ID HAVING count(*) > 1 ) x ) AND PUNCHCARDRECORD_DATE = DATE_SUB( CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) AND TENANTID = '1'
